mapper.insert:
select member_seq.nextval from dual
insert into member(user_no,user_id,user_pwd,name,zipcode, address,address_detail,hp,email,grade,user_ssr,gender, regdate,del_flag, deldate) values(#{user_no},#{user_id},#{user_pwd},#{name},#{zipcode}, #{address},#{address_detail},#{hp},#{email},#{grade}, #{user_ssr},#{gender},#{del_flag},#{deldate},)
mapper.select: select * from member where user_id=#{user_id} and deldate is null
select user_pwd from member where user_id=#{user_id} and deldate is null
select count(*) from member where user_id=#{user_id}
